title: Style visualizations to match SPSS software output

requirements.summary: Update bar graph styling to match SPSS output aesthetics with clean, minimalist design, thin gridlines, standard gray axes, sans-serif labels, and muted statistical software colors
acceptanceCriteria: Bar graphs display with thin horizontal gridlines on white background
Axis labels use standard sans-serif font (Arial or similar)
Chart colors use SPSS-style palette (muted blues, greens, oranges)
Bars have minimal spacing and no shadows or gradients
Legend and labels match typical SPSS output formatting

file_operations.description: Update Recharts configuration to apply SPSS-style aesthetics: replace current color palette with muted SPSS colors (soft blue #4472C4, muted green #70AD47, soft orange #ED7D31), configure thin horizontal gridlines with stroke color #E0E0E0, set axis stroke to #808080, apply sans-serif font family (Arial or system-ui), remove bar shadows and gradients, minimize bar spacing using barCategoryGap and barGap props, and update legend styling to match SPSS output format

requirements.summary: Update table styling to match SPSS output aesthetics with simple grid layout, thin borders, monospace or sans-serif fonts, subtle header background, and precise numeric alignment
acceptanceCriteria: Tables display with thin, consistent borders around all cells
Header row has subtle gray background distinguishing it from data rows
Numeric values are right-aligned and use consistent decimal places
Font matches SPSS output (typically Arial or Courier)
No rounded corners or decorative styling

file_operations.description: Apply SPSS-style table formatting: add thin border (1px solid #D0D0D0) to all table cells, apply subtle gray background (#F5F5F5) to header row, implement right-alignment for numeric values and left-alignment for text values using cell content detection, set font family to Arial or system sans-serif, remove rounded corners and decorative styling from table and cards, ensure consistent spacing and padding that matches statistical software output aesthetics
